job_history.work_description: Managed accounting functions for power and gas company with a fleet of highly efficient power plants. Managed and executed accounting, treasury and administrative functions in fast-paced setting. Performed month-end close, journal entries, account and balance sheet reconciliations, variance analysis and forecasting functions.

Performed accounting activities during a period of significant corporate change. Managed accounting processes with speed and accuracy. Interfaced with vendors and customers in resolving discrepancies and billing issues.

Provided accounting expertise and support for investment management firm with $129B assets under management. Prepared quarterly, semiannual and annual financial statements, and oversaw SEC and other regulatory filings for 145 investment portfolios.

Conducted pre-bankruptcy accounting and financial analysis, and post-bankruptcy claims compression tasks. Prioritized and completed the full range of accounting actions, such as consolidating financial statements, reconciling accounts, preparing balance sheet summaries, schedules and annual reports.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in financial analysis, including pre-bankruptcy and post-bankruptcy analysis, variance analysis, and forecasting functions, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in accounting, including managing accounting functions, performing month-end close, journal entries, account and balance sheet reconciliations, and preparing financial statements, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in preparing quarterly, semiannual, and annual financial statements, and overseeing SEC and other regulatory filings, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Planning
skills.explanation: Experience in forecasting functions and variance analysis, suggesting strong proficiency in financial planning.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed accounting functions and teams in fast-paced settings, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed accounting processes with speed and accuracy, and prioritized and completed a full range of accounting actions, suggesting strong proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Interfaced with vendors and customers in resolving discrepancies and billing issues, indicating a solid level of proficiency in communication.
